statements: DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE value > 100 AND sensor_type = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_type = 'Temperature' AND location = 'Room A';
DELETE FROM model_data WHERE model_name = 'Linear Regression';
DELETE FROM sensor_data WHERE sensor_id = 100 AND sensor_name = 'Temperature';
DELETE FROM model_data WHERE model_name = 'Regression Model' AND model_accuracy < 0.85;
DELETE FROM iot_devices WHERE is_active = TRUE;
DELETE FROM iot_devices WHERE device_id = 5 AND is_active = TRUE;
